heading: For god sake - Enough""
review: i spoiled my last night by seeing it......totally useless movie. unnecessary violence ,, irritating acting ,, awful background music, Diana was dumb...............just one word for the movie - - - - - - Enough" - the direction
column3: camera and background score are worst.this movie falls short of expectations
column4: mainly due to the gaping holes in the plot.the movie's weak link was it's story. i will go 1 out of 10 for this worst ever movie. I have only one request to the movie makers... Please don't waste money on stealing the scripts and filming them
column5: you can rather dub the movie in Hindi and put some songs at end and it will work just as fine..."
